mapper.insert: insert into kdemymember (usernum, userid, passwd, username, birthday, useremail, phone, postcode, address, address2) values ( (select nvl(max(usernum)+1,1) from kmedymember),#{userid}, #{passwd},#{username}, #{birthday},#{useremail}, #{phone},#{postcode}, #{address},#{address2} )
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from kdemymember WHERE userid=#{userid}
